q: Finance Dwight Duncan , Brampton Mayor Susan Fennell , CAW Barack Obama Ken Lewenza and other local officials, joined employees in recognizing the importance of the plant, the workforce and the 300 and Charger in the future success of the company. The launch of the all-new 2011 Chrysler 300 and Dodge Charger demonstrates how far this company has come in 18 months, said Sergio Marchionne . "Earlier today, we were contacted by Brandon Watson , director of developer experience for Windows Phone 7, to discuss the ChevronWP7 unlocking tool," the developers wrote in a Dec. 1 posting. Through this discussion, we established a mutual understanding of our intent to enable homebrew opportunities and to open the Windows Phone 7 platform for broader access to developers and users. Microsoft is planning a series of Windows Phone 7 updates in order to introduce new features to the platform and tweak it for better performance. " again, Betty White quips, "I think you do a thing once and then you run like a thief." David Letterman then asks her what she does in her free time and Betty White says, Oh, I like to do most anything. Play with animals, mostly. And vodka's kind of a hobby. So David Letterman reaches down from behind the desk and produces a bottle of Grey Goose, to which Betty White laughs heartily. They share some vodka, then she does a classic spit-take.
